description: Main source code for a Flutter-based audiobook store app, including UI components, data models, storage helpers, and a simulated audio player controller.

classes.name: Audiobook
classes.description: Data model representing an audiobook with properties like id, title, author, cover, duration, and audioAsset, with JSON serialization methods.

classes.name: PurchasedAudiobook
classes.description: Data model representing a purchased audiobook along with current playback position, with JSON serialization.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: Helper class for loading and saving purchased audiobooks and last played book ID from device local storage.

classes.name: AudiobookStoreApp
classes.description: Root widget for the application, initializing and managing app-wide data and theme.

classes.name: _AppData
classes.description: Model holding the app data including all books, purchased list, and last played book ID, with a load method.

classes.name: AudiobookRoot
classes.description: Main scaffold widget managing bottom navigation and switching between store, library, and player tabs.

classes.name: StoreTab
classes.description: UI component displaying available audiobooks with purchase buttons.

classes.name: AudiobookCard
classes.description: Individual card widget for a single audiobook, showing cover, title, author, duration, and purchase status.

classes.name: LibraryTab
classes.description: UI widget listing purchased audiobooks with options to open or delete.

classes.name: PlayerTab
classes.description: UI component for audio playback, showing current selected audiobook or placeholder.

classes.name: AudiobookPlayer
classes.description: Full-screen widget providing audio controls, cover image, progress, and playback controls.

classes.name: ProgressBarTiny
classes.description: A small, lightweight linear progress indicator for showing playback progress.

classes.name: ProgressBarFancy
classes.description: A customizable slider widget for seeking in the audio track, with callbacks.

classes.name: AudioPlayerController
classes.description: A simulated audio controller mimicking play, pause, seek, and position updates, using a timer.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the app, initializes Flutter bindings and runs the root widget.
